gtag-config-analyticsid: ID del conto de Google Analytics (GT-xxxxxxx o GTM-xxxxxxx)
gtag-config-anonymizeip: Anonymisar adresses IP inviate a Google Analytics
gtag-config-enabletcf: Activar supporto pro le infrastructura IAB pro transparentia & consentimento
gtag-config-honordnt: Honorar le capite DNT que indica que un usator non desira esser traciate.
gtag-config-tracksensitivepages: Includer codice de traciamento in paginas potentialmente sensibile como UserLogin e Preferences
right-gtag-exempt: Non esser traciate per Google Analytics
